snippet: Major League Baseball suspended Cole Hamels for five games for intentionally hitting the Nationals’ Bryce Harper with a pitch on Sunday.
abstract: Major League Baseball suspends Philadelphia Phillies pitcher Cole Hamels for five games for intentionally hitting Washington Nationals outfielder Bryce Harper with a pitch.
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball suspended Cole Hamels for five games for intentionally hitting the Nationals’ Bryce Harper with a pitch on Sunday.

headline.seo: Hamels Suspended 5 Games for Intentionally Hitting Harper With a Pitch
headline.main: Phillies’ Hamels Is Suspended for Five Games
headline.print_headline: Phillies’ Hamels Is Suspended For Five Games
